name: In The Ruined Courtyard
description:
In January 1559, Elizabeth I was crowned Queen at Westminster Abbey in Westminster Abbey, London.
Under the reign of the new queen, the chaotic situation in the Kingdom of England gradually stabilized.

In August 1560, Brandt, a traveler from the Kingdom of France, arrived in London with the young girl Leif, whom he met at the Salisbury stone ring.
Following the commission of the Marquis of Hertfordshire, the two learned about one end of London's politics - the underground forces from Spain and the tragedies that occurred under the rule of Mary I in the past······
The various reasons of the past will be revealed at a banquet······

Text adventure games, each chapter is a story that tells the political and religious situation in England during the 16th century.
A small amount of classical music, including classic tracks by Schubert and Tchaikovsky.
Gothic UI, minimalist interface.
Friends who are interested in Western European retro, political, and religious themes may want to give it a try.


Attachment: This game is independently developed and produced by individuals, with character drawing and CG outsourcing.
Painter: Chongzibuchichong
